    Methods in gameobjects with parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description

  • Uses of Item in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects

    Methods in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects that return Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Item[] Hero.getInventory()
    Returns the Hero inventory.
    Methods in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects with parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    GroundItem Hero.addInventory​(Item item)
    Adds an item into the Hero inventory, if the Item as the name "money", "key" or "bomb" then it will be added in the hero variable of the same name.
    void Hero.updateItemBonus​(Item item)
    Updates the bonus effect from the item.

  • Uses of Item in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem

    Methods in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem that return Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Item GroundItem.getItem()
    Returns the item of the GroundItem, that the hero will pick up by colliding with the groundItem.
    Methods in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem with parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GroundItem.setItem​(Item item)
    Sets what item the GroundItem is holding on too.
    Constructors in gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem with parameters of type Item 
    Constructor Description
    GroundItem​(Vector2 position, Vector2 size, java.lang.String imagePath, Room room, @Nullable Item item, boolean consumable)
    Constructs a new GroundItem, whose position and size are specified by the Vector2 argument, whose room is specified by the Room argument, and whose item is specified by the Item argument.
